docs.lead_paragraph: As anyone who has strolled around New York this summer can clearly see, the braless look is very much in evidence under sheer tops and tight-fitting T-shirts. Generally speaking, most of the women who go braless are under 30 and are relatively smallbreasted, but the unfettered feeling has found
docs.abstract: Article on brassieres; discusses esthetic and medical arguments for wearing or not wearing a bra; drawing (L)
